publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2788# Angus MacKay: The Tourism Industryâ€”That the Parliament recognises that the economy of Edinburgh and the whole of Scotland depends greatly on not only attracting tourists but also encouraging them to return; further recognises the importance of tourist accommodation and attractions being of the highest possible quality, and considers that the Scottish Executive should encourage and support the maintenance of high standards in the tourism industry to ensure that visitors to Scotland have a memorable experience and return.

S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Trish Godman*, Mr David Davidson*, Robert Brown*, Rhoda Grant*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Tavish Scott*, Sarah Boyack*, Alex Neil*, Margaret Jamieson*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Elaine Thomson*, Brian Adam*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Maureen Macmillan*, Susan Deacon*

S1M-2788# Angus MacKay: The Tourism Industry-That the Parliament recognises that the economy of Edinburgh and the whole of Scotland depends greatly on not only attracting tourists but also encouraging them to return; further recognises the importance of tourist accommodation and attractions being of the highest possible quality, and considers that the Scottish Executive should encourage and support the maintenance of high standards in the tourism industry to ensure that visitors to Scotland have a memorable experience and return. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Trish Godman, Mr David Davidson, Robert Brown, Rhoda Grant, Brian Fitzpatrick, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Tavish Scott, Sarah Boyack, Alex Neil, Margaret Jamieson, Mr Alasdair Morrison, Elaine Thomson, Brian Adam, Maureen Macmillan, Susan Deacon, Michael Russell*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*, Stewart Stevenson*, Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Smith*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) David McLetchie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Ian Jenkins*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Helen Eadie*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Jackie Baillie*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Ms Margo MacDonald*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Cathie Craigie*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, John Scott*, Phil Gallie*, Elaine Smith*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Brian Monteith*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Gil Paterson*
S1M-2788# The Tourism Industry (lodged on 26 February 2002) Mr Murray Tosh*
